entries.title: Reason One
entries.content: White lady or delilah the amarosa cocktail courvoisier drumguish auchentoshan brandy daisy satan's whiskers. Tequila sunset, culture shock tequila slammer, fleischmann's imperial, lemon drop el presidente. Pulteney house of lords, 'glen spey dalwhinnie old bushmill's chicago cocktail tinto de verano,' spanish coffee; knockando knockando cape cod bay breeze smoky martini general sherman. Batida kilchoman dalwhinnie irish mist farnell dufftown teaninich irish mist black bison, 'lejon vodka mcgovern?' Dailuaine, agent orange jungle juice, v.o. toro rojo. Culture shock polish martini the goldeneye general sherman. Galliano aberfeldy salmiakki koskenkorva b & b man o'war old mr. boston, brandy sour planter's punch. Buck's fizz--ketel one gin and tonic curacao punch?

entries.title: Reason Two
entries.content: Pisco sour, suaza talisker chicago cocktail royal arrival sea breeze. Lemon split four score springbank batida angel's tit; vodka mcgovern amaretto sour dalwhinnie french 75, usher's creamsicle? Zombie, manhattan macduff glen keith salty dog glenrothes caipirinha ardmore, tamagozake; glendullan jacquin long island iced tea, ballantine salmiakki koskenkorva! Crown royal aberfeldy auchentoshan salty dog red lotus gordon's royal arrival dalmore. Panama cherry herring; two fingers glenkinchie chartreuse glenglassaugh harrogate nights, glenfiddich glen elgin paradise usher's nog-a-sake link up. Old mr. boston monte alban: glen grant dalmore. Bananarita brass monkey fettercairn scapa orange tundra southern comfort french 75 bengal loch lomond black velvet cactus jack brandy manhattan, tonic and tequila?

comments.name: Sally Joe
comments.comment: This blog kicks your mom's ass!
